text: Yevgeni Anatolyevich Yarkov (; born 27 May 1973 in Perm) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Sportspeople from Perm Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Energiya Volzhsky players Category:FC Amkar Perm players Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Rotor Volgograd players
title: Yevgeni Yarkov
